content.article_body: MUZAFFARGARH, Feb 24 (APP):A man was shot dead in a market by his brother-in-law for divorcing his sister near here on Monday. The accused has been arrested, and a case was registered. According to the police sources, the incident occurred in the jurisdiction of Karam Dad Qureshi police station. The suspect, Ghulam Abbas, allegedly gunned down his former brother-in-law, Muhammad Sakhi,. Local people overpowered the accused and handed him over to the police with his weapon. The police shifted the victim's body to a hospital and started investigation.
